languages.text: "Лорд-капитан? П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?.."

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан? П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?.."

languages.text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан? П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?.."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of umber?"
"Lord Captain? W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of umber?"
"Lord Captain? W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of maroon?"
"Lord Captain? W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of maroon?"
"Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"
"Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？な…なぜ突然暗い栗色に代わってしまったのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？な…なぜ突然暗い栗色に代わってしまったのですか？」

languages.text: “舰长大人？你……你的颜色怎么突然变成了深黑色？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？你……你的颜色为什么突然变成了深黑色？”

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán? ¿P-por qué sus colores se han vuelto de repente del rojo más oscuro?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán? ¿P-por qué sus colores se han vuelto de repente del rojo más oscuro?».

languages.text: "Lord Captain? W-Warum sind Eure Farben plötzlich so dunkelbraun geworden?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? W-Warum sind Eure Farben plötzlich so dunkelbraun geworden?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? P-pourquoi vos couleurs ont subitement viré au marron foncé ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? « P-pourquoi vos couleurs ont subitement viré au marron foncé ? »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan? N... Neden bir anda renklerin bordoya döndü?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain? W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan? Neden... Neden bir anda renklerin bordoya döndü?"
